<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/voip/price/{callId:\\w+}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Saves a price for the call with the ID specified in the request.

  as={"h2"}
